title: Title
dragandDropOrClick: Drag and drop an image here or click
informationOne: You are fully responsible for the user content that you upload.
informationTwo: You confirm that you are the creator of the user content or have all the necessary rights to make the user content available.

addmoreImages: Feel free to upload additional images of the same artwork. It can be from a different angle or from the studio when the artwork was created.
doneCropping: When you are done cropping, press the green button.
limitArtwork: Upload limit reached, please upgrade to Portfolio Premium to upload unlimited artworks
yourWelcome: You are always welcome to contact us if you have any questions about the service or want to get in touch with us.
deviating: Deviating opening hours during bank holidays and art exhibitions openings.
